gw.api.database.upgrade

Class CreateSpatialIndexVersionTrigger

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.database.upgrade.VersionAction

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDatamodelChange<BeforeUpgradeVersionTrigger>

    public abstract class CreateSpatialIndexVersionTrigger
extends BeforeUpgradeVersionTrigger
implements IDatamodelChange<BeforeUpgradeVersionTrigger>
    Version trigger to create a new spatial index with non-Guidewire default options

    • Constructor Detail

      • CreateSpatialIndexVersionTrigger

        public CreateSpatialIndexVersionTrigger(int minorVersionWhenTriggerIsApplicable)
        Parameters:
        minorVersionWhenTriggerIsApplicable - This is the minor version from the metadata.properties file or extensions.properties. Typically, one would bump the number by 1 in the file and use the new number here.

    • Method Detail

      • createSpatialIndex

        public void createSpatialIndex(java.lang.String tableName,
                      java.lang.String columnName,
                      java.lang.String ddl)
        Creates a spatial index with the given DDL. Can be called from the execute() method. For information about the DDL syntax and available options, please consult the documentation for your database: Oracle: http://docs.oracle.com/html/A88805_01/sdo_intr.htm#877657 Microsoft SQL Server: http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/bb964712.aspx DB2:
        Parameters:
        tableName - Name of the table with the spatial column
        columnName - Name of the column with the spatial datatype
        ddl - Full DDL to create the spatial index.

      • hasVersionCheck

        public boolean hasVersionCheck()
        Specified by:
        hasVersionCheck in class BeforeUpgradeVersionTrigger
        Returns:
        true if this version trigger has an associated version check. Please override createVersionCheck().

      • getDatabaseUpgradeVersionTrigger

        public BeforeUpgradeVersionTrigger getDatabaseUpgradeVersionTrigger()
        Specified by:
        getDatabaseUpgradeVersionTrigger in interface IDatamodelChange<BeforeUpgradeVersionTrigger>
        Returns:
        The database version trigger to execute. Null if nothing to do for database upgrade.

      • getArchivedDocumentUpgradeVersionTrigger

        public ArchivedDocumentUpgradeVersionTrigger getArchivedDocumentUpgradeVersionTrigger()
        Specified by:
        getArchivedDocumentUpgradeVersionTrigger in interface IDatamodelChange<BeforeUpgradeVersionTrigger>
        Returns:
        The archived document version trigger to execute. Null if nothing to do for the archived document upgrade.
